titles.title: North Fork Watershed Protection Act of 2013
A bill to withdraw certain Federal land and interests in that land from location, entry, and patent under the mining laws and disposition under the mineral and geothermal leasing laws.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 2/7/2013--Introduced. North Fork Watershed Protection Act of 2013 - Withdraws federally owned land or interest in land within the North Fork Lands Withdrawal Area in Montana from: (1) all forms of location, entry, and patent under the mining laws; and (2) disposition under all laws relating to mineral and geothermal leasing.
